short_summary: AMENDMENT TO RESPONSE DEADLINE CLOSING TIME.
description: CBSA is looking to procure one V-Shaped Tumbler Blender to be delivered to Ottawa, Ontario before August 31, 2024 with a 12-month warranty. No options for further units are included.
